title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Highly anticipated with acclaimed creator Vince Gilligan and Emmy-nominated Rhea Seehorn. Boasts an exceptional 87 Metacritic score and 8.1 IMDb rating from over 76,000 votes on Apple TV.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, amid a spate of unexplained disappearances of local children, a group of misfit friends begin to suspect a long-buried ancient evil lurking. As the kids set out to determine what's really going on, a rising unease prompts several townspeople to work together to restore peace – all while a U.S. military operation seeks to exploit Derry for its own objectives.
reason: Part of the popular 'IT' franchise on HBO, helmed by successful director Andy Muschietti. It holds an impressive 8.0 IMDb rating from over 71,000 votes, indicating significant audience interest.

title: Monster: The Ed Gein Story
overview: The shocking true-life tale of Ed Gein, the infamous murderer and grave robber who inspired many of Hollywood's most iconic on-screen killers.
reason: From prolific creator Ryan Murphy, known for Netflix's highly popular 'Monster' anthology, and starring Charlie Hunnam. This series benefits from a strong brand and creator track record on a major streaming platform.

title: All Her Fault
overview: In Chicago, Marissa Irvine arrives at 14 Arthur Avenue, expecting to pick up her young son Milo from his first playdate with a boy at his new school. But the woman who answers the door isn't a mother she recognizes. She isn't the nanny. She doesn't have Milo. And so begins every parent's worst nightmare.
reason: Features Emmy-winning actress Sarah Snook and popular actor Jake Lacy. It has a solid 7.5 IMDb rating with over 21,000 votes, indicating strong viewer engagement.

title: Boots
overview: After impulsively joining the U.S. Marine Corps, a bullied teen finds new purpose — and unexpected brotherhood — with his motley team of fellow recruits.
reason: A Netflix series starring well-known actress Vera Farmiga, achieving a strong 7.9 IMDb rating from over 22,000 votes, demonstrating significant audience approval.
